description: a(n) = least prime of the form n*k! + 1.
comments: First prime in the sequence n + 1, 2n + 1, 6n + 1, 24n + 1, 120n + 1, ...If p is a prime then a(p-1) = p.
prog: (PARI) a(n) = k = 1; while (!isprime(p=1+n*k!), k++); p; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 20 2016
